title: Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classroom        Curriculum Materials Travel the Captain John Smith Trail without having to leave your classroom.  Lesson plans and classroom resources are available here to aid in your study of the travels of John Smith, American Indian society and culture and the Chesapeake Bay. All Curriculum Materials     Traveling Trunks Traveling trunks are offered by a variety of trail partners and give students a hands-on opportunity to discover history. All Traveling Trunks
